select qna_question_seq.nextval from dual
insert into qna_question (qna_question_no, mem_no, question_title, question_content, qna_type_no, question_open) values(#{qnaQuestionNo}, #{memNo}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{qnaTypeNo}, #{questionOpen})
mapper.select: select a.*, m.mem_name from qna_question a left join member m on a.mem_no = m.mem_no order by qna_question_no desc
